game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom, a rare gemstone necklace.
game.description: Lord Edgar's treasured necklace has gone missing during a recent gathering. The family is in an uproar, and he needs someone brave to retrieve it for him.
game.reward: A small pouch containing 100 gold coins and a note of gratitude from Lord Edgar.

tasks.objective: Investigate the scene of the crime
tasks.description: Speak with the guests who attended the gathering and see if anyone noticed anything suspicious.
Talk to the servants and guards to gather more information about what might have happened.

tasks.objective: Follow the lead on the suspicious character
tasks.description: Track down the person who was seen lurking around the area where the necklace went missing.
